summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the construction of a storm relief sewer in Harrison Street from 2nd Avenue North to 5th Avenue North; in 5th Avenue North from Harrison Street to Republican Street; and in 3rd Avenue North, Nob Hill Avenue and 4th Avenue North each from Thomas Street to Harrison Street as a part of the additions to and betterments of the Municipal Sewerage Utility contemplated by Ordinance 87653, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund as an advance to the Municipal Sewerage 1959 Construction Fund.
